name: SHOOT the MONSTERS
description:
SHOOT the MONSTERS

Not such a great game but it's the best I could come up with. Hope you like it.

Arrows to move, Mouse movement to aim, Mouse1 to shoot and R to restart.

NO levels, NO score sharing, Just surviving for as long as you can with limited ammo. 1 monster = +1score / 1 monster = +5ammo / 3sec = +1ammo.
